Song.title: Mercies Anew
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Mark Altrogge and Bob Kauflin © 2002 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [| B | B | G#m7 | B/F# | Emaj9 | Emaj9]
Verse 1: Every [B]morning that breaks, there are [E/B]mercies a[B]new Every [E/B]breath that I [B]take, is your [C#/G#]faithfulness [F#]proved And at the [B]end of each [G#m]day, when my [E]labors are [A]through I will [B/C#]sing [C#m]of Your [F#sus]merc[F#]ies a[B | B | E/G# | F#sus]new
Verse 2: When I’ve [B]fallen and [G#m]strayed, there were [E]mercies a[B]new For you [E]sought [F#]me in [G#m]love, and my [C#/E#]heart you purs[F#sus]ued In the [B]face [F#/A#]of my [G#m]sin,{,} Lord, You [E]never withd[A]rew So I [B/C#]sing [C#m]of Your [F#sus]merc[F#]ies a[B |]new
Chorus: And [F#/A#]Your [G#m]mer[F#]cies, they will [E]never [B]end For ten [G#m]thousand [F#]years they’ll rem[E]ain [F#]And when [G#m]this world’s [F#]beauty{,} has [E]passed a[D#m]way Your [D]mer[E]cies will [A]be unch[C#m7]anged [| F#sus]
Verse 3: And when the [B]storms [F#/A#]swirl and [G#m]rage, there are [E]mercies a[B]new In af[E]flic[F#]tion and [G#m]pain,{,} You will [C#/E#]carry me [F#sus]through And at the [B]end [F#/A#]of my [G#m]days, when Your [E]throne fills my [A]view I will [B/C#]sing [C#m]of Your [F#sus]mer[F#]cies a[C#m]new [| B/D#] I will [E]sing of Your [F#7sus]mercies a[B |]new
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 every morning that breaks there are mercies anew every breath that i take is your faithfulness proved and at the end of each day when my labors are through i will sing of your mercies anew verse 2 when ive fallen and strayed there were mercies anew for you sought me in love and my heart you pursued in the face of my sin lord you never withdrew so i sing of your mercies anew chorus and your mercies they will never end for ten thousand years theyll remain and when this worlds beauty has passed away your mercies will be unchanged verse 3 and when the storms swirl and rage there are mercies anew in affliction and pain you will carry me through and at the end of my days when your throne fills my view i will sing of your mercies anew i will sing of your mercies anew
